name: Happy Hoister
description:
Happy Hoister is a casual crane operating simulator, which lets you experience the fun of controlling a tower crane.

Disclaimer: This is a prototype. There is currently only one level - it can however be played as many times as you like.

How to play

Build a house by moving the crates to the drop zone. You succeed when the house is complete.

You're not required to complete the level. Try stacking crates or throw them awaaaay! 

Controls

This list is also available from the in-game menu.

  • Turn: A / D
  • Trolley: W / S
  • Hoist: Arrow up / down
  • Drop: Spacebar
  • Camera: Tab
